接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.Engine

  • 使用Engine的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.manager.host  
    org.apache.catalina.session
    This package contains the standard Manager and Session implementations that represent the collection of active sessions and the individual sessions themselves, respectively, that are associated with a Context.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  

    • org.apache.catalina.core中Engine的使用

      实现Engine的org.apache.catalina.core中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  StandardEngine
      Standard implementation of the Engine interface.

    • org.apache.catalina.manager.host中Engine的使用

      声明为Engine的org.apache.catalina.manager.host中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Engine HostManagerServlet.engine
      The associated engine.

    • org.apache.catalina.session中Engine的使用

      返回Engine的org.apache.catalina.session中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Engine ManagerBase.getEngine()
      Retrieve the enclosing Engine for this Manager.

    • org.apache.catalina.startup中Engine的使用

      声明为Engine的org.apache.catalina.startup中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Engine Tomcat.engine 
      protected Engine EngineConfig.engine
      The Engine we are associated with.
      protected Engine[] Embedded.engines
      已过时。 
      The set of Engines that have been deployed in this server.
      返回Engine的org.apache.catalina.startup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Engine Embedded.createEngine()
      已过时。 
      Create, configure, and return an Engine that will process all HTTP requests received from one of the associated Connectors, based on the specified properties.
      Engine Tomcat.getEngine()
      Access to the engine, for further customization.
      参数类型为Engine的org.apache.catalina.startup中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Embedded.addEngine(Engine engine)
      已过时。 
      Add a new Engine to the set of defined Engines.
      void Embedded.removeEngine(Engine engine)
      已过时。 
      Remove the specified Engine from the set of defined Engines, along with all of its related Hosts and Contexts.
